changes.description: Fixed issue where the system would try to find the Battle button immediately after a battle, causing unwanted retry loops and automatic OK button presses.
Added state-aware Battle button detection that prevents clicking during post-battle transitions.
Reduced Battle button retry aggressiveness from 5 attempts to 3 attempts with shorter delays.
Fixed premature Battle button detection during loading screens and post-battle transitions by increasing confidence threshold from 0.4 to 0.7.
Implemented 5-second cooldown period after successful Battle button clicks to prevent immediate re-detection during transitions.
Added battle detection stability system to handle temporary GUI detection failures - now waits 5 seconds before considering a battle actually ended.
Prioritized post-battle screen detection (OK, Play Again, 2v2 End) over Battle button detection to ensure proper flow.
Fixed false 'main menu detected' messages during post-battle screens by adding transition state protection.
Added automatic update checking system that compares current version with latest GitHub release.
Implemented centralized version management with embedded version constants in the main script.
Added version display in startup banner and initialization logs for better version tracking.
First public release of the website and bot. The website now has basic information about the bot, features, and a Discord invite link.
